body_html: @peterjc123 Do you mind testing current master with the default MKL installation in C:/Program Files (x86)/IntelSWTools/compilers_and_libraries/windows? I think we might want to add back the default MKL location in FindMKL.cmake in some way.

body: @peterjc123 Do you mind testing current master with the default MKL installation in `C:/Program Files (x86)/IntelSWTools/compilers_and_libraries/windows`? I think we might want to add back the default MKL location in `FindMKL.cmake` in some way.
